channel.title: Ultimo 508! WORKING G.E.! AWESOME CONTROLLER!
channel.description:
Welcome to Ultimo508!
Okay so what's the story here? Well My asshole partner fucked me over and leaked our source on google... So I am releasing it properely here...
It's got lots of awesome features but not much content, basically a blank source with lot's of sexy features, perfect to work from .
Features:
- Amazing Control Panel. - FULL GRAND EXCHANGE! (All important items working, Easy to add more via CFG file ). - FULL CastleWars! - FULL Bounty Hunter! - MySQL enabled (commented out at the moment, so you can enable). - Fully working SkillCape Emotes . - 90% Clan Chat, (Nothing missing that you will notice ). - FULLY Working Dueling. - 90% Working DUEL TOURNAMENTS! - FULLY Working Equipped Items Interface! (WITH Weight! Which effects your run energy! - ALL Skills work fully! [b] Pictures:
AMAZING CONTROL PANEL! [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/25z4e1d.png[/img]
Grand Exchange!! [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3087/ss20090724020031.png[/img]
Equipment Interface! [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/rli6w3.png[/img]
CastleWars! [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/f9i3hk.png[/img]
Skill Cape Emotes! [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/34s2i5j.png[/img]
Instructions:
To Compile or Run go to the "cmd" folder and run "Run and Compile GUI". It's an executable JAR for those of you who can't run Normal JARs Properely .
If it fails to start the gui for some reason, It is either because your JRE is out of date or for some unforeseen reason. For non fatal errors it will run the server automatically under JAVAW so there will be no console.\
If the server does not run please update you JRE .
Here is a Virus Scan in case you are worried about the Executable JAR : [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2qvav55.png[/img]
*
Thanks! - s0ulwar5![/b]
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?blgaycjfapff4we [/b]

item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Here is the source, I even executed it just for the “Lol’s”.

seof3a.png1287×406

A Picture of the source, a picture of what it adds to the Registry keys then hides then melts the virus to c:/system64
Oh & A virus total picture. It’s simple to remove, I executed it and disabled it in about 10 seconds. Just a warning for the 12 year olds above.

item.description:
@s0ulwar5 wrote:

Welcome to Ultimo508!

Okay so what’s the story here? Well My asshole partner fucked me over and leaked our source on google… So I am releasing it properely here…

It’s got lots of awesome features but not much content, basically a blank source with lot’s of sexy features, perfect to work from .

Features:

  • Amazing Control Panel.
  • FULL GRAND EXCHANGE! (All important items working, Easy to add more via CFG file ).
  • FULL CastleWars!
  • FULL Bounty Hunter!
  • MySQL enabled (commented out at the moment, so you can enable).
  • Fully working SkillCape Emotes .
  • 90% Clan Chat, (Nothing missing that you will notice ).
  • FULLY Working Dueling.
  • 90% Working DUEL TOURNAMENTS!
  • FULLY Working Equipped Items Interface! (WITH Weight! Which effects your run energy!
  • ALL Skills work fully!
    [b]
    Pictures:

AMAZING CONTROL PANEL!

Grand Exchange!!

Equipment Interface!

CastleWars!

Skill Cape Emotes!

Instructions:

To Compile or Run go to the “cmd” folder and run “Run and Compile GUI”.
It’s an executable JAR for those of you who can’t run Normal JARs Properely .

If it fails to start the gui for some reason, It is either because your JRE is out of date or for some unforeseen reason.
For non fatal errors it will run the server automatically under JAVAW so there will be no console.\

If the server does not run please update you JRE .
